me.ipodtouch0218.sjbotcore

Class SJBotCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • me.ipodtouch0218.sjbotcore.SJBotCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.EventListener

    public class SJBotCore
extends net.dv8tion.jda.core.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    Simple JDA Bot Core. Proves fundamental bot function like command handling and message listening, along with saving and loading bot configurations. Requires a BotSettings instance to start.

    • Constructor Summary

      SJBotCore(BotSettings settings)

      Returns an MessageSettings instance containing the currently used messages.

        public void startBot()
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Starts the bot with the token from the current BotSettings instance.

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        See Also:
        startBot(String)

      • startBot

        public void startBot(java.lang.String token)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Starts the bot with the given token. Settings will be loaded from the currently loaded BotSettings instance.
        Parameters:
        token - - String token the bot will use to login to the account.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException

      • stopBot

        public void stopBot()
        Shuts down the currently running shard manager.
        See Also:
        ShardManager.shutdown()

      • loadConfigFromFile

        public void loadConfigFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Loads a BotSettings config from the given file. If the file is blank, or reading the file somehow fails, a default settings file will be loaded in its place.
        Parameters:
        file - - File to load a BotSettings instance from.

      • saveConfigToFile

        public void saveConfigToFile(java.io.File file)
        Saves the current Botsettings to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - - File to save the current BotSettings configuration to.
        See Also:
        YamlConfig.saveConfig(File)

      • registerCommand

        public boolean registerCommand(BotCommand cmd)
        Registers a command to the currently used CommandHandler. Shorthand for the MessageHandler register method.
        Parameters:
        cmd - - Command to be registered
        Returns:
        If the command was successfully added, i.e. ArrayList.add(Object)
        See Also:
        MessageHandler.registerCommand(BotCommand)

      • unregisterCommand

        public boolean unregisterCommand(BotCommand cmd)
        Unregisters a command from the currently used CommandHandler. Shorthand for the MessageHandler unregister method.
        Parameters:
        cmd - - The command to be unregistered
        Returns:
        If the command was successfully removed, i.e. ArrayList.remove(Object)
        See Also:
        MessageHandler.unregisterCommand(BotCommand)

      • setMessages

        public void setMessages(MessageSettings newsettings)
        Replaces the current MessageSettings instance being used.
        Parameters:
        newsettings - - MessageSettings instance to use.

      • getShardManager

        public net.dv8tion.jda.bot.sharding.ShardManager getShardManager()
        Returns the ShardManager instance the bot is running on. ShardManager replaces using separate JDA instances for each shard, and allows management of each shard together.
        Returns:
        The ShardManager instance, the bot itself.

      • getCommandHandler

        public MessageHandler getCommandHandler()
        Returns the MessageHandler instance currently being used to parse commands.
        Returns:
        Current MessageHandler instance.

      • getBotSettings

        public BotSettings getBotSettings()
        Returns the BotSettings that are currently being used to start the bot.
        Returns:
        The currently used BotSettings instance.

      • getMessages

        public MessageSettings getMessages()
        Returns an MessageSettings instance containing the currently used messages.
        Returns:
        Currently used MessageSettings instance

      • isBotRunning

        public boolean isBotRunning()
        Returns if the bot is currently running. Changes when the startBot() and stopBot() functions are called, not necessarily when the JDA itself has shut down.
        Returns:
        If the bot is running.
